description: Summarize the overall performance of the Health Insurance Division for 2025. Include insights such as policy count, claims processed, average settlement time, customer satisfaction, and major initiatives mentioned.
Provide a summary of the Motor Insurance Division performance for 2025. Mention total policies, claims processed, fraud detection improvements, and customer satisfaction metrics.
Generate a combined summary comparing the Health and Motor divisions. Highlight similarities and differences in renewal rate, customer satisfaction, and automation initiatives.
